proj.zoie.api
接口 IndexReaderFactory<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader>

所有已知子接口：
Zoie<R,D>
所有已知实现类：
Hourglass, LuceneNRTDataConsumer, SearchIndexManager, SimpleZoieSystem, ThrottledLuceneNRTDataConsumer, ZoieSystem
public interface IndexReaderFactory<R extends org.apache.lucene.index.IndexReader>

This interface is IndexReader instances are to be managed.

方法摘要
 org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer getAnalyzer()
          Gets the default analyzer used for indexing.
 List<R> getIndexReaders()
          Returns a list of index readers.
 void returnIndexReaders(List<R> r)
          Returns the index readers.
 

方法详细信息

getIndexReaders

List<R> getIndexReaders()
                                                                    throws IOException
Returns a list of index readers.

返回：
List of IndexReader instances
抛出：
IOException

getAnalyzer

org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer getAnalyzer()
Gets the default analyzer used for indexing.

返回：
Default analyzer

returnIndexReaders

void returnIndexReaders(List<R> r)
Returns the index readers.

参数：
r - Returns the list of index reader instances.
